ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Lance S.G. Finch ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. LANCE S.G. FINCH, Chief Justice of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, effective June 16, 2013.
